phrases: You will go if you are a man!
It is going to change your whole world!
My mom's going to yell at me...
Kao-chan, we came to pay you a visit...
Now I can never be anyone's bride!
You really threw us a curve, getting hospitalized like this.
I am only here for routine testing, just to make sure.
Have you ever passed out like that before?
I have always been a little anemic,
but this is a good chance to get thoroughly tested.
I guess I pushed myself a little too hard.
You know, all that violin practice,
not to mention chasing after Mr. Escape Artist... all week long!
The stress of not being able to rehearse together, and all...
That is right, that is right!
That is right, that is right!
Kaori and I did not make it to the next round.
You have not said a word of reproach.
I am going to spend the night!
Okay, Kao-chan, see you at school!
Have you been playing the piano?
It would be so much easier if she just chewed me out.
I have nothing to offer but my piano playing...
Do you think you will be able to forget?
What were you talking about with Kao-chan?
Then you should not mind telling me!
Is playing the piano all I have to offer?
You have lots of good qualities, Kousei.
Do you think you will be able to forget?
Did you see me make the shot?!
You gave me a heart attack.
I am sending this to Kaori-chan.
Let us stop by the hospital tomorrow.
I hear she is getting discharged the day after.
Let us get her a present on the way.
So he already knows her email address...
I bet she will get a kick out of that!
You should go by yourself, Watari.
I am the one who made a fiasco out of her competition.
You were the one she leaned on.
But that is only because I am the one who can play the piano.
That is all there is to it.
I know that but you will never know.
Do not hold back because of me.
We might catch her naked again!
The captain should not be slacking!
Just watch all the dazzling plays I make!
Our final tournament's about to start!
And besides, after witnessing that spectacle, how can I not get all fired up?
The way you two were that day...
It is burned into my mind!
Do you think you will be able to forget?
The piano is just one part of you.
But in that moment, without a doubt...
The piano was everything to you.
And you are trying to rip that away by force.
As if you were plucking off your limbs...
That is why it hurts too much for you to bear.
Your face says the suffering is so painful, too painful to bear...
Do you think you will be able to forget?
Because you and I are living for that moment.
You were great, middle school duo!
Because you are a musician, just like me.
the people here will not ever forget us.
I will not forget, even if I die.
It is all thanks to you.
Because you played the piano for me.
she will not let me give up.
The one who was being supported...
What the heck was that, Tsubaki?
I know, even though the water's so cold.
Yeah, but you used to dive from the Courage Bridge all the time.
Not to mention, always shoving Arima-kun off it...
Kousei always laughed it off himself.
I would not call that no biggie.
I know it for a fact.
Did something happen between you and Arima-kun?
Do not say freaky things like that!
I mean, being upbeat is your only saving grace.
But yesterday and today, you kind of have not been yourself.
If it is not Kashiwagi and Tsubaki!
Now that is a high school student!
I have not seen you since graduation.
You burning up the league as usual?
It is tough being a first year again.
I am nothing but a gofer.
And if they would just let me play shortstop, I would be the best, you know?
The former captain of our baseball team.
Totally hot, dependable, and the one all the girls dreamed about.
So unlike someone else I know.
No one's idea of a dreamboat...
I do know that Kousei has lots of good qualities besides playing the piano, after all!
So why am I feeling so uneasy, then?
The former captain of our baseball team.
and the one all the girls dreamed about.
But I was never able to tell him,
and my love melted away with the snow on graduation day, and it was over.
That is the kind of love I thought it was.
Look, I am serious about this, okay?
And yet why... why is not my heart sparkling, I wonder?
I bet if this was back around graduation,
my heart would have been sparkling like a starry sky in winter.
So she is out of the hospital.
Do not get the wrong idea.
As if you can see right through me, into my heart...
She said she was waiting for someone.
Why are you holding out your hand?
My gift for getting out of the hospital.
And you are the one who made such a mess of my performance!
When I was gunning to win it all!
This is why men are so...!
I will do something for you, okay?
You will do anything I ask?
Hmm, what should I ask for?
There is no way I can do that.
You were playing fine that day.
There you go again, looking down!
We are all afraid, you know... to get up onstage.
Maybe they will totally reject you.
Even so, you grit your teeth and get up onstage anyway.
Something compels us... moves us to play music.
Is it like that for you, too?
Everything you say and do... it all sparkles so brightly.
It is too blinding for me, and I end up closing my eyes.
I do not deserve to be a performer.
I played with all my might because I wanted my mother to get well, and yet...
There are tons of musicians in the same boat.
Ones who think, I will be darned if I do this, or Why do not you play it?
And yet, you pick it up again... and you sit before that score.
We are still only 14, you know!
Let us pull out all the stops, and dive right in!
I have always wanted to try that!
It is too blinding for me, and I end up closing my eyes.
But I cannot help aspiring to be like you.
Do you think you will be able to forget?
That moment, when my music reached them...
It is going to change your whole world!
There is no way I could ever forget that.
There is no way I could ever forget.
